definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
land use plan (official P.R.C. government term)
pinyin: tu3 di4 li4 yong4 gui1 hua4
wang3 luo4 gui1 hua4 ren2 yuan2
Lian2 he2 guo2 Huan2 jing4 Gui1 hua4 shu3

sentences.english: Then, the suboptimal control law is achieved using the dynamic programming principle.
sentences.chinese: 然后，使用动态规划得到增广系统的次优控制律。

sentences.english: Thus parts sequences of subassemblies can be automatically planned.
sentences.chinese: 由此，完成子装配体内零件的自动顺序规划。

sentences.english: Optimality Conditions for a Class of Generalized Semi-infinite Programming;
sentences.chinese: 并给出了非线性半定规划的最优性必要和充分条件。

sentences.english: Lishui City Planning Exhibition Hall warmly welcomes your arrival.
sentences.chinese: 丽水市城市规划展览馆竭诚欢迎您的到来。

sentences.english: Their perspectives and priorities were not in sync with their actions.
sentences.chinese: 他们的行动与他们的远景规划和优先级考虑不一致。

sentences.english: Organize and Formulate Post-Disaster Production and Reconstruction Program.
sentences.chinese: 组织制定灾后生产重建规划。

sentences.english: Urban planning from two-dimensional arrangement to three-dimensional planning began long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 城市规划由平面的布置转向三维的规划，历史源远。

sentences.english: Urban planning from two-dimensional arrangement to three-dimensional planning began long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 城市规划由平面的布置转向三维的规划，历史源远。

sentences.english: They roughed out the city plan.
sentences.chinese: 他们画出了城市规划的草图。

sentences.english: There isn't a consistent conclusion about how to ensuring water pipe diameter in relate field.
sentences.chinese: 在规划的什么阶段确定管径，一直众说不一。

sentences.english: 10 a.m. - Head over to the Urban Planning Exhibition Center, a six story building, situated on People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 参观位于人民广场的上海城市规划展示馆。

sentences.english: Supervision Planning is the guiding papers in practice. Who is incharge of drawing it up?
sentences.chinese: 监理规划是监理工作中的指导性文件。

sentences.english: The Hainan example represents the first province-wide spatial planning.
sentences.chinese: 海南省是全国第一个开展省域空间规划的改革试点。

sentences.english: The paper concludes with some suggestions for the development of China' s rural planning laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 文尾提出对我国乡村规划法规建设的一些建议。

sentences.english: Number four, the central authorities have already approved the long-term plan for the reform and development of the pearl river delta region.
sentences.chinese: 第四，中央已经批准珠三角改革和发展的长远规划。

definition: long-term/at a fixed date in the future (e.g. for repayment)/abbr. for 遠期合約|远期合约[yuan3 qi1 he2 yue1]
